message.entry: Expected the number of rotations and translations to be the same or 1 for one of them. Instead, found {0,number,integer} rotations and {1,number,integer} translations.
Invalid first argument. Initialize an se2 array from a 2-by-2 rotation matrix, 3-by-3 transformation matrix, or another rotation / transformation representation.
"trvec" 입력 및 "xytheta" 입력에는 추가적인 평행 이동이 허용되지 않습니다.
